originalText.text: My friends and I rented one surrey and two duo pedal cars. This was so fun! We enjoyed racing around the island. It's a great workout.  The staff here could've been friendlier, but the experience with the rentals once we took off pedaling was worth it.My friends and I rented one surrey and two duo pedal cars. This was so fun! We enjoyed racing around the island. It's a great workout.  The staff here could've been friendlier, but the experience with the rentals once we took off pedaling was worth it.

originalText.text:
What an outstanding experience with Blazing Saddles!

My girlfriend and I had decided months ago that we wanted to go spend some time in New York City and do some bike riding around Governors Island.   A Google search brought us to Blazing Saddles and we found it very convenient to book our bikes online in advance of our visit.

We arrived at Governors Island around 8:35 am on this past Sunday morning.  The walk to the Blazing Saddles rental tent was less than five minutes.  Though we arrived before its official opening, there was someone at the front desk who was happy to check us in and get us our bikes.  We rented Island Cruisers for the entire day for a price of $30 which seemed fair.  We even spent the optional $5 per bike for insurance which I don't think was really needed but gave us peace of mind against any potential accidents that included damage.

The bikes were in excellent shape.  One of the extras we asked for were bike locks which they don't automatically throw in unless you ask for them (no extra charge).   These locks came in handy as we stopped several times around the island to do some exploring.

Biking around Governors Island was incredibly fun.  Since we started our trek early in the morning, we felt as if we had the entire island to ourselves.  However, as the day progressed, it became quite crowded, the amount of bikers increased, and we found ourselves having to dodge around the influx of riders.  By 1 pm in the afternoon we felt it had become too crowded to enjoy biking further and we returned our rentals.  Upon the return, a rep asked us if we had a good time and we resounded with a huge, "yes!"

If you are considering a 2-hour rental or an entire day, I would recommend a full day.  You can absolutely ride the entire island and its inner pathways within 2 hours.  However, that 2 hours goes very quickly and if you want to stop and explore or have something to eat, that's time taken away from your bike ride.  I think having the luxury of having the bike all day for slightly more than the hourly rate is the way to go.

Overall, we had a fantastic experience with Blazing Saddles.  They were extremely friendly, made the rental process effortless, and provided us with bikes that were in excellent shape.  We are looking forward to doing this again in the fall.

originalText.text:
Super impressed with the staff here. Needless to say it’s quite busy on sukkos here and yet the staff are swift and keep their cool about everything. Shout out to the lady who checked me in and out who said she even recognized me upon check in.

The tandem bikes are very cute and might be a good idea for some scenarios-but they are very very heavy so it gets very tiring. Better to rent single bikes if possible

originalText.text: Lovely experience thanks to the folks working here! We didn't have to wait at all, got a recommendation for best spots to see, and had a ton of fun. (We were there on a Tuesday afternoon and it felt like we had the island to ourselves.)

text.text: Lovely experience thanks to the folks working here! We didn't have to wait at all, got a recommendation for best spots to see, and had a ton of fun. (We were there on a Tuesday afternoon and it felt like we had the island to ourselves.)

originalText.text:
LOVED the EXPERIENCE!

Arrived Wednesday morning, at 8:55am--five minutes shy of opening hours. As soon 9am hit, the place opened promptly and the young lady at the front accommodated my brother and I very quickly. She made the process seamless/easy!

The cruiser bikes were well maintained, tire pressure felt sufficient, and brakes were very responsive.

Overall, the experience went without a hitch and allowed us to explore this beautiful island! Also, the staff were charismatic, professional and very helpful!
